snippet: Judge Shira A. Scheindlin, who told the New York Police Department to change its stop-and-frisk strategy, declined to postpone them pending an appeal by the city.
abstract: Federal Judge Shira A Scheindlin, who told the New York Police Department to change its stop-and-frisk strategy, declines to postpone them pending an appeal by the city; says request would send wrong signal.
lead_paragraph: Judge Shira A. Scheindlin, who told the New York Police Department to change its stop-and-frisk strategy, declined to postpone them pending an appeal by the city.

headline.main: Judge Won’t Delay Order on Policing
headline.print_headline: Judge Won’t Delay Order on Policing
